mapper.select: SELECT board_idx, title, contents, create_id, create_dt, update_id, update_dt, hit_cnt FROM spring_db.spring_board_sein WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY board_idx DESC
SELECT board_idx, title, contents, create_id, create_dt, update_id, update_dt, hit_cnt FROM spring_db.spring_board_sein WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring_db.spring_board_sein (title, contents, create_id, create_dt) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents}, #{createId}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE spring_db.spring_board_sein SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, update_id = #{updateId}, update_dt = NOW() WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.delete: UPDATE spring_db.spring_board_sein SET deleted_yn = 'Y' WHERE board_idx = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE spring_db.spring_board_sein SET hit_cnt = hit_cnt + 1 WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}
